humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the assessed axillary lymph nodes (0/4). Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage is N0, which indicates no metastases in regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that axillary lymph nodes were negative (0/4), which means that there was no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
